snippet: Two human rights activists who have tried to bring Prime Minister Narendra Modi to trial over the 2002 Gujarat riots now face charges themselves.
lead_paragraph: Two human rights activists who have tried to bring Prime Minister Narendra Modi to trial over the 2002 Gujarat riots now face charges themselves.

headline.print_headline: In Challenging Narendra Modi, Rights Activists Risk a Legal Backlash
headline.main: In Challenging Modi, Indian Activists Risk a Legal Backlash
